special_abilities.name: Blood Frenzy.
special_abilities.desc: The coral smasher has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn’t have all its hit points.

special_abilities.name: Limited Amphibiousness.
special_abilities.desc: The coral smasher can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

special_abilities.name: Shark Telepathy.
special_abilities.desc: The coral smasher can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

special_abilities.name: Siege Monster.
special_abilities.desc: The coral smasher deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack.
actions.desc: The coral smasher makes two attacks with its warhammer, or one attack with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: WarhammerMelee Weapon Attack:
actions.desc: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: BiteMelee Weapon Attack:
actions.desc: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: ClawsMelee Weapon Attack:
actions.desc: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) slashing damage.
